body:
I am on the team HOME (I am counted as RememberThat), and I wanted to ask the leaders if maybe I could be a leader just to schedule some practices over the school year for those who still want to do some fun scrims. 

Just a thought, 

RattleWarrior

title: Team Home Leader Request

replies.body: sure u can be a leader
